text: Jack Evan Noseworthy Jr. is an American actor known for his roles in Event Horizon, U-571, Barb Wire, and Killing Kennedy. == Career == He appeared in Bon Jovi's music video "Always", with Carla Gugino and Keri Russell. He co- starred with Meryl Streep in the Public Theater's 2006 production of Mother Courage and Her Children. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Jack Noseworthy
